CustomField.description: GTMS-27663 - -1*(FFM Amount + IF 3PF is not null, then + Competitor Buyout, If Is reimburable = Yes, then + Install costs)
CustomField.formula: -1 * (Future_Free_Months_Amount__c + IF( Finance_Partner_Account__c = null, Competitor_Buyout_Amount__c, IF( TEXT(Is_Installation_Reimbursable__c) = 'Yes', Total_Estimated_Installation_Costs__c, 0)))
CustomField.label: OF DC Total
